channel.title: Need two small things fixxed on my server before i release
channel.description: I have 2 small things to fix before i release my server both bank related this is a 317. I cannot figure out how to change the name of the bank when it is opened the text at the top were it normally say "Bank of (servername here)" im not sure how to change that and i would love to learn how. Also the second thing is also to do with the bank. The items will save when you put them in the bank but when you re log or log out and back in the bank will be empty. This sounds like im just overlooking it and is a easy fix but i would like some help either way. Please and thank you

item.title: Need two small things fixxed on my server before i release
item.dc:creator: @Pk6uhave2 Pk6uhave2
item.description:
@Pk6uhave2 wrote:

Don’t search the server name with Bank of. Just try “Bank of”. Just wondering, what base are you using?

Read full topic

Just got on i posted that at work on my lunch

and its funny cuz yes I did search actionhandler.java and no bank of (server name) is in it…

I also used regular notepad and just did a whole search on bank of… and I got stuff and changed and saved and compile and ran an still didn’t change

item.title: Need two small things fixxed on my server before i release
item.dc:creator: @IfearI IfearI
item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

The bank of … isn’t hard to change but you’ll have to find the proper ID for that “label” (or w/e name such thing has).

If it isn’t saying “The Bank of Runescape” at the moment then someone already changed the “label”, try searching for the text that is now being shown if that is the case.

The Bank being empty will be something to do with the saving or loading. Without the code I’m not really able to help you out I’m afraid. Try posting all codes related to the banking.

Read full topic
